title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on New Daily Madrazo Bounties
content:
Martin Madrazo wouldn’t be where he is without racking up a few enemies. Martin's heard about you going into business with Maude and Jenette — and he wants in on the action. Daily Madrazo Bounties are now available to Bail Enforcement Office owners and are paying out 2X GTA$ and RP this week.

Complete three bounties for Martin Madrazo through July 24 and you will be awarded the Weekly Challenge bonus of GTA$100,000.
